00031 #include "../common/common.h"
00032 #include "../common/edei.h"
00033 
00034 using namespace std;
00035 
00037 struct clargs {
00038   Path command;               
00039   Path fdname;                          
00040   EDEIoptions edeiopt;            
00041   bool beverbose;                               
00042 
00044   clargs(int argc, char *argv[]); 
00045 };
00046 
00047 
00048 clargs::
00049 clargs(int argc, char *argv[]){
00050 
00051   beverbose = false;
00052   
00053   poptmx::OptionTable table
00054         ("Converts the rocking curve of the analyzer to the function used in the EDEI.",
00055          "I use this program only to develop and debug the EDEI algorithm. If you"
00056          " you are not interested in it, you don't need this program.");
00057 
00058   table
00059         .add(poptmx::NOTE, "ARGUMENTS:")
00060     /*.add(poptmx::ARGUMENT, &edeiopt.RCname, "RC",
00061       EDEIoptions::rcOptionShortDesc, EDEIoptions::rcOptionDesc, "")*/
00062     .add(poptmx::ARGUMENT, &edeiopt.FDname, "FD",
00063          EDEIoptions::fdOptionShortDesc, EDEIoptions::fdOptionDesc, "processed-<RC>")
00064 
00065         .add(poptmx::NOTE, "OPTIONS:")
00066         .add(edeiopt.options())
00067         .add_standard_options(&beverbose)
00068         .add(poptmx::MAN, "SEE ALSO:", SeeAlsoList);
00069 
00070   if ( ! table.parse(argc,argv) )
00071         exit(0);
00072   if ( ! table.count() ) {
00073         table.usage();
00074         exit(0);
00075   }
00076 
00077   command = table.name();
00078 
00079   if ( ! table.count(&edeiopt.RCname) )
00080     exit_on_error(command, string () +
00081                                   "Missing required argument: "+table.desc(&edeiopt.RCname)+".");
00082   if ( ! table.count(&edeiopt.FDname) )
00083         edeiopt.FDname = upgrade(edeiopt.RCname, "processed-");
00084 
00085 }
00086 
00087 
00089 int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
00090 
00091   const clargs args(argc, argv);
00092   const EDEIprocess proc(args.edeiopt.RCname, args.edeiopt.Gm, args.edeiopt.Gp,
00093                          args.edeiopt.mpinter, args.edeiopt.smooth, args.edeiopt.acof);
00094   proc.saveFD(args.edeiopt.RCname);
00095   exit(0);
00096 
00097 }
